input.sentences: a lot of people were at the house party yesterday .
there were so many people i could n't even find a place to sit .
there were so many people talking at once that i could n't really hear what anyone was saying .
people had to lean in really close and whisper so that i could hear them .
output.sentences: Yesterday, my roommate decided to throw a party and invite a bunch of people I don't know.
They were everywhere, sitting on my sofa, drinking my drinks, and even eating my chips.
About an hour into it, a few people showed up that I actually knew from class so I grabbed a glass of wine and tried to enjoy myself.
Some guy kept hitting on me the entire night, maybe he finally got the hint when my friend took this pic and sent it to everyone with the caption "Beware" haha.
This morning, I probably looked like quite a weird one since I wrapped my whole head in a scarf to block out the bright lights and loud noises!
